link_desc:
Based on Squid 3.4.8 and template from aqis, site: http://foraqis.ru/?p=378

Usage: must be installed squidclient:

sudo apt-get install squidclient
Check: sudo squidclient mgr:info
Normal output:
# squidclient mgr:info
Sending HTTP request ... done.
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: squid/3.4.8
Mime-Version: 1.0
Date: Sun, 12 Mar 2017 21:23:44 GMT
Content-Type: text/plain
Expires: Sun, 12 Mar 2017 21:23:44 GMT
Last-Modified: Sun, 12 Mar 2017 21:23:44 GMT
X-Cache: MISS from XXXXXXXXXXXXX
X-Cache-Lookup: MISS from XXXXXXXXXXXXX:3128
Via: 1.1 XXXXXXXXXXXXX (squid/3.4.8)
Connection: close

Squid Object Cache: Version 3.4.8
Build Info:  linux
Start Time:     Thu, 19 Jan 2017 05:00:48 GMT
Current Time:   Sun, 12 Mar 2017 21:23:44 GMT
Connection information for squid:
............


Install Zabbix agent to server, make changes to /etc/zabbix/zabbix_agentd.conf and add in the end strings from file "Squid template for zabbix agent config.txt"

Restart Zabbix agent: sudo /etc/init.d/zabbix-agent restart

Import template to Zabbix server.
Have a fun :)
